<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ultimate Mercy](/Feats.aspx?ID=260) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 115 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Mercy](/Feats.aspx?ID=225)

</column>

---

Your mercy transcends the bounds of life and death. When you use Mercy, you can cast [_lay on hands_](/Spells.aspx?ID=395) on a creature that died since your last turn to return it to life. The target returns to life with 1 hit point and becomes wounded 1. You can’t use Ultimate Mercy if the triggering effect was [_disintegrate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=76) or a death effect.
name: Ultimate Mercy
